import { Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' function TotalPrice({ cartitems }) { return ( PRICE DETAILS
Price({cartitems.items.length}items) ₹{cartitems.bill} Discount -₹0 Delivery Charges ₹40
TOTAL AMOUNT ₹{40+cartitems.bill} ) } export default TotalPrice
